metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3012 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The ioQuake3 engine, as used in World of Padman 1.2 and earlier, Tremulous 1.1.0, and ioUrbanTerror 2007-12-20, does not check for dangerous file extensions before writing to the quake3 directory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted third-party addon that creates a Trojan horse DLL file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2011-2764.

criterions.comment: ioquake3 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
